page.title: 10In Praise of Hexhamshire
page.content:
{H}exhamshire is fun because there are {E}normous trees to climb. {X}cept in winter,if the snow is here, {H}exhamshire is friendly. {A}lot of people are my friends. {M}um is busy looking after us. {S}ometimes we can go for walks. {H}istory is all around. {I}like farming, {R}iding horses, {E}very day I see something new. Gavin Lowes
Lots of trees to shade us from the sun Lots of space and fun for everyone, Fresh air, Everywhere, Not like the busy town. Lots of hills and fields and moors, Going up and down. Sorrel Cosens
